title: Her High School Bully Is Haunting Her Adult Life, What Should She Do?!
description:
The past has a funny way of creeping up on you when you least expect it and before you know it, you’re left trying to pick up the pieces you thought you put together before. It can be triggering and altogether debilitating when having to confront your past; our Bert Show listener Michelle is currently feeling these effects right now.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
